title: 'Soft Suicide' And Other Southern Troubles In 'Roses'
teaser: Christopher Denny's music can be described as Arkansas soul. He talks with NPR's Lourdes Garcia-Navarro about a new album that fuses rock, folk and gospel, called If the Roses Don't Kill Us.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
